document.id: City of American Canyon, Cal., Ord. No. 2010-06
document.heading: AN ORDINANCE OF THE CITY COUNCIL OF THE CITY OF AMERICAN CANYON ADDING CHAPTER 5.60 OF TITLE 5 OF THE NAPA COUNTY CODE BY REFERENCE WITH A LOCAL AMENDMENT FOR MUL TIGENERATIONAL FAMILY HOUSEHOLDS, RELATING TO REQUIREMENTS FOR PERMITS FOR ELDER AND/OR DEPENDENT ADULT CAREGIVERS
